title: Daily reminder to bring back solo que

replies.body: Can't wait for Vayne mains to build {{item:3147}} and abuse it with her ult.

It would be shitty. Anyone who actually understands the game and understands champions would know this. She would lose waaaaay too much damage if she let herself go invis for the who second. I'd be worried about it on Twitch/Talon.
You can also take in Ezreal. Poke with Q, back up a bit into the fog of war, then come back and poke again.
Technically he is correct though. You don't need invis, you only need to not be seen. Not sure how much extra damage it would offer though.

I'm gonna say that Riot said "unseen" instead of "invisible" because now we have invisibility and camouflage. I doubt they thought people would take fog of war into consideration. But I guess it could happen.

It's true damage and scales with lethality, so assuming you're going tri force with duskbar and maybe a few more lethality items, you can get around 600-800 damage in a single Q with duskblade proc, most of it being true damage.

Tested the weapon in bots as Teemo with sheen, gunblade and duskblade and had similar results.

And the duskblade says you have to be NOT SEEN by the enemy team for a second, so as ezreal, all you have to do is fall back, wait for the blade to proc then go back in, your range with Q is so insane that you don't need to wander off too far to re-proc it.
Can't wait to have her win rate drop because of it
I mean if I didn't know how to play against a champ I wouldn't scream op, but I guess some people have to.
